title: On the edge of tomorrow
text:
Som sagt, er ikke så hardcore, men nogle gange er der bare nogle ting jeg skal ud...

On the edge of tomorrow
I´m standing tall - walking fast
knowing that none of this will last.
My live, my craft, my love... 
I know I´m bound to fail.
There´s no point in going on, 
there´s no point in pretending to be strong.

On the edge of tomorrow
I´m hiding behind a smile, 
but not a smile forcing it´s own way out
a smile faked by me
a smile forced by me
a smile bound to fail.

On the edge of tomorrow
I feel that I see sunshine in the future
but then I realise that you´re just faking;
that I´m still alone,
noone calls me on the phone
noone´s sendind me a letter

On the edge of tomorrow
I realize that I was wrong
I realize that somewhere, 
out there
someone´s waiting to make it all better...

My family is there
all the juggalos in the world are
waiting to drink
waiting to help
waiting for me.

On the egde of tomorrow...
